jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing and implementing high-quality software solutions.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Join our data team to build ML models and derive insights from large datasets. Experience with Python and TensorFlow required.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Manage our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. Experience with AWS, Kubernetes, and Terraform preferred.

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: Lead product development for our SaaS platform. 5+ years of product management experience required.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Build beautiful and responsive web applications using React and TypeScript.

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description: Design and implement scalable backend services using Python and FastAPI.

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.description: Deploy and optimize ML models in production environments. Experience with MLOps tools required.

jobs.title: Security Engineer
jobs.description: Protect our systems and data. Experience with penetration testing and security audits required.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Work on both frontend and backend of our web applications. React and Node.js experience required.

jobs.title: QA Engineer
jobs.description: Ensure quality of our software through automated and manual testing. Selenium experience preferred.
